document.full_text: president bashar al-assad defied calls on wednesday to lift a decades-old emergency law and said syria was the target of a foreign conspiracy to stir up protests in which more than 60 people have been killed.
document.title: assad sees syria plot, unyielding on emergency law
lines_and_colors: president bashar al-assad defied calls on wednesday to lift a decades-old emergency law and said syria was the target of a foreign conspiracy to stir up protests in which more than 60 people have been killed.
